title: Poached smoked haddock Monte Carlo
description: Gently smoked haddock fillets served with spinach, poached eggs and a white wine sauce brings some Monte Carlo panache.
ingredients: 1kg/2lb 2oz white fish bones, washed and chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
4 x 175g/6oz natural smoked haddock, pin boned and skin on
3 ripe tomatoes, skinned, seeds removed and cut into diamonds
salt and freshly ground black pepper
